resources.string: In order to allow smsforall.org to work properly, you need to give the right permissions.
In order to allow smsforall.org to work properly, you need to give the right permissions.
Enter the activation pin of the new devise (Get a PIN from https://app.smsforall.org)
Shortly you\'ll receive an SMS message confirming the status of the device
The device was activated successfully, enjoy smsforall.org
The PIN code is invalid or it was already activated
An error ocurred when trying to validate the PIN number
And error ocurred when trying to validate the device, please make sure your device has a valid plan and correctly connected to a Network connection and that you are able to send SMS messages manually
If you already received this error message more than once, please try to uninstall and install again the application
